name: Path To Gaea
description:
Path To Gaea is a turn based puzzle-adventure that follows a simple story between good and evil. Take on the role of Kitsune and with the help of your little Wisp solve all the puzzles and discover the secret of Gaea's Crystal.

Key features

  • Experience great visuals with a captivating soundtrack.
  • Fight enemies, overcome dangerous obstacles and escape deadly traps.
  • Difficult puzzles with moving platforms, switches, obstacles and spikes.
  • Collect hidden crystals to unlock new skins.

 
As you progress, more elements are introduced – such as new enemies or trap types – gradually increasing the difficulty as the puzzles become more complex.
